definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
weak/feeble/young/inferior/(following a decimal or fraction) slightly less than

sentences.english: Its pale rays fled out on either hand; beautiful but grim was the vision they disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 微弱的光线向两旁流泻而出，照出的景象美丽而阴森。

sentences.english: There are no or faint enzyme reaction products in low differentiated adenocarcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 低分化腺癌上述酶大都无反应或反应微弱。

sentences.english: Recent polls in Indiana give a slight edge to Clin ton.
sentences.chinese: 最近的民调结果给希拉里还来了微弱的优势。

sentences.english: This method can be used in coast based radar for detecting weak targets in sea clutter.
sentences.chinese: 该方法可以用于岸基对海雷达检测海表面微弱目标。

sentences.english: He read the note in the dim torchlight.
sentences.chinese: 他借着微弱的电筒光看了条。

sentences.english: He once again nosed ahead of me on the horse race last week.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期的马赛上，他又一次以微弱优势胜过了我。

sentences.english: Then I heard a faint beeping noise that didn't sound like a bird.
sentences.chinese: 这时，我听见一阵微弱的响闹声，听起来不像是鸟叫。

sentences.english: I love the fireside when all the lights are low.
sentences.chinese: 我爱灯光微弱时的围炉。

sentences.english: Why, I, in this weak piping time of peace.
sentences.chinese: 为什么，我，在这和平之声微弱莫辨的时代。

sentences.english: Instead of being faint or light pink, these new diamonds are hot pink.
sentences.chinese: 反而受到微弱或浅粉色，这些新的钻石热粉红。

sentences.english: Through the grass came a soft silvery tinkling.
sentences.chinese: 从草海中传来了一阵微弱的银叮铃声。
“我们在这儿，”京京声音微弱地叫道。

sentences.english: Stimulate the site of greatest pain with a small negative current.
sentences.chinese: 以微弱负电流刺激疼得最厉害的部位。

sentences.english: If breathing is difficult or weak, give oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 如果呼吸困难或微弱，输氧。

sentences.english: The wind had got up again, and seemed sharpened by the thin sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 风又吹了起来，而且在微弱的阳光下仿佛刮得更猛了。

sentences.english: He kept in contact with her, if only very tenuously and intermittently.
sentences.chinese: 他同她保持着联系，尽管只是微弱的时断时续的联系。

definition: light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
